name: Ultimate Devouring System
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeUnknown
content: After transmigrating, Ye Xuan obtained a devouring system, not only can he devour items, he can also exchange blood vessels, martial arts, magic weapons, elixirs and treasures…holy! This is easy as f-! “Dont bother me, do you believe i can’t devour your magic weapon?”
